content: here is part 2 of the arcanoweave doily incanter s insight continues where part 1 left off starting with round 9 and ending at round 19 here are links to parts 1 3 4 and 5- part 1 arcane aura- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura part 3 evocation- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation part 4 innervision- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision part 5 terrace of the magi- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi **materials needed** 50-72 yards of size 10 crochet thread 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors **finished size** the doily measures about 8 in diameter the thread i m using is aunt lydias size 10 cotton crochet thread in the colors purple and wood violet
